directions.step:
1. USE 2 LB 8 OZ (1 2/3-NO. 2 1/2 CN) CANNED, SLICED APPLE PIE FILLING MIX. PREPARE ACCORDING TO DIRECTIONS ON CONTAINER.
Recipe Number: D00303
SERVING SIZE: 2 TBS
